price: Basi tuliwapatiliza, tuka- wazamisha baharini kwa sababu walizikanusha Ishara zetu, na wakaghafilika nazo.
arabic: فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ بِأَنَّهُمۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَكَانُواْ عَنۡهَا غَٰفِلِينَ
footnotes: Tuliwateremshia nakama yetu. Tukawazamisha baharini kwa sababu ya kushikilia kwao kukanusha Ishara zetu, na hadi ya kutoyabali mafunzo ya Imani na ut'iifu yaliyomo katika hizo Ishara.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-intaqamnā min'hum fa-aghraqnāhum fī al-yami bi-annahum kadhabū biāyātinā wakānū ʿanhā ghāfilīna
